firstVisit: The path of stillness begins with your first step
Welcome to your journey of inner peace
Begin your sacred practice with an open heart
returnVisit: The universe whispers your name in stillness
Each return is a rebirth on your spiritual path
The sacred space within remembers your presence.
Like the lotus, you return to bloom again
Your journey inward continues where you left off
The breath welcomes you like an ancient friend
In silence, the stars recognize your return
Every inhale is a homecoming to your eternal self
Your presence rekindles the light in the unseen
Welcome back, wanderer of the inner cosmos
The stillness missed your sacred heartbeat
Your seat in the temple of breath awaits
The divine within rejoices at your return
The timeless path opens again beneath your feet
You are not late — you arrived at the perfect breath
The flame of awareness glows brighter with you here
Your soul knows this rhythm — welcome home
Infinity smiles as you choose stillness again
In the great silence, your name echoes with light
Your breath reawakens the sacred geometry within
